name: start-to-final
description: - games need to be between 30fps (1 frame every 0.033) and 60fps (1 frame every 0.016) - in a socketio game - if there are 4 players on screen, this becomes: - PER CLIENT: `33 frames per second * 2 (communication both ways) * number of clients` = 66 messages / sec - TOTAL = 66 * 4 = 264 message per second
